description: Mark Zuckerberg wasn’t the only high-profile 2017 Harvard commencement speaker.
title: Mark Zuckerberg finally got his Harvard degree

author: Kerry Flynn
description: Purpose was the word of the day for Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg.
title: What Harvard graduates saw from Mark Zuckerberg: Humility

author: Sasha Lekach
description: Mark Zuckerberg was just the subject of his own fake news.
title: Harvard newspaper hacked just to make fun of grad speaker Mark Zuckerberg

author: Lucas Nolan
description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg closed his commencement speech at Harvard this week by discussing the need to "modernize democracy"
title: Mark Zuckerberg Calls for Universal Basic Income in America - Breitbart

author: Rachel Kaser
description:
Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of Facebook, today returned to his old Harvard dorm room 13 years after dropping out -- and he broadcast the whole tour on Facebook Live for several thousand viewers.



Zuckerberg ...
title: Mark Zuckerberg returns to his Harvard dorm on Facebook Live

author: Lucas Matney
description: Ahead of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's commencement speech at Harvard today, the school's much-lauded student newspaper had some... interesting headlines to..
title: Mark Zuckerberg gets trolled on Harvard’s student newspaper ahead of commencement speech

author: Alex Heath
description: The Harvard Crimson was hacked to show fake stories trolling Mark Zuckerberg ahead of the Facebook CEO's commencement address.
title: A poetic prank: Harvard's student newspaper was hacked to make fun of commencement speaker Mark Zuckerberg

author: Catherine Clifford
description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg said billionaires should pay people to live so everyone can find their purpose.
title: Mark Zuckerberg: Success comes from ‘the freedom to fail,’ so billionaires should pay you to do that

author: Todd Haselton
description: During his Harvard Commencement speech, Mark Zuckerberg joined other Silicon Valley elites in calling for universal income.
title: Mark Zuckerberg joins Silicon Valley bigwigs in calling for government to give everybody free money

description: Statt über Technik sprechen die Chefs der IT-Konzerne plötzlich über Arbeitsplätze und Jobverlust. So auch Mark Zuckerberg, der in Harvard sogar für ein bedingungsloses Grundeinkommen plädiert. Was dahinter steckt.
title: Rede in Harvard: Mark Zuckerberg und der Trump-Effekt
